channel.title: Posts on Faith-Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Faith-Blog

item.title: A new life in Christ
item.description: It is possible to live a life of dominion, constant victory, and triumph. It is possible that you are always happy and never depressed. It is possible that you never fall sick and never have to visit the doctor. You may be so healthy that you never have to take drugs with negative side effects. You may be at constant peace with your family and children that you never have to worry about them.

item.title: Activation
item.description: Abraham’s blessings are mine, Abraham’s blessings are mine. I am blessed in the morning, I am blessed in the evening. Abraham’s blessings are mine As believers, we are blessed with every spiritual blessings prepared for us in heavenly places in Christ Jesus. We have exceeding great and precious promises set to our credit and documented in the Word. Jesus Christ came and died for us to redeem us from the curse of the law and to bring us into spiritual blessings I Corinthians 1:3.

item.title: When you go through fire, He is with you and you'll not be consumed.
item.description: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me (Psalms 23:4). Are you passing through difficult times? Do you feel like giving up? Do you strongly regret your past decisions and actions? Do you feel hopeless and discouraged? However you feel as you read this post, God’s Word to you is that “I am with you”.

item.title: Is that a cooking show?
item.description: With a warning label this big, you know they gotta be fun! Son, as your lawyer, I declare y’all are in a 12-piece bucket o’ trouble. But I done struck you a deal: Five hours of community service cleanin’ up that ol’ mess you caused. Why, those are the Grunka-Lunkas! They work here in the Slurm factory. Hi, I’m a naughty nurse, and I really need someone to talk to. $9.
